instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions
While pasta cooks, cut pancetta into small cubes and cook in a large skillet until crispy
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheeses, and black pepper
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper
servingSuggestions: Serve with a crisp green salad and a glass of white wine

instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garam masala, and turmeric for 2 hours
Cook marinated chicken in a hot pan until browned
In the same pan, sauté onions, garlic, and ginger
Add tomatoes and cook until softened
Add coconut milk and bring to simmer
Return chicken to pan and cook for 15-20 minutes
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with basmati rice
servingSuggestions: Serve with naan bread, cucumber raita, and mango chutney

instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces
Make dressing by whisking together anchovy, garlic, egg yolk, mustard, and lemon juice
Slowly drizzle in olive oil while whisking
Toss lettuce with dressing
Top with croutons and shaved Parmesan
Season with black pepper and serve immediately
servingSuggestions: Serve as a starter or light lunch with grilled chicken

instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl
Cream butter and sugars until light and fluffy
Beat in eggs and vanilla
Gradually mix in flour mixture
Stir in chocolate chips
Drop rounded tablespoons onto ungreased baking sheets
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown
Cool on baking sheets for 2 minutes, then transfer to wire racks
servingSuggestions: Serve warm with a glass of cold milk

instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium heat
Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning with water as directed
Simmer for 5 minutes until thickened
Warm taco shells in oven according to package directions
Fill shells with beef mixture
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, onion, cheese, sour cream, and salsa
Serve with lime wedges
servingSuggestions: Serve with Mexican rice and refried beans

instructions: Slice eggplants and grill until tender
Brown lamb with onion and garlic
Add tomatoes, cinnamon, and oregano, simmer for 20 minutes
Make béchamel sauce: melt butter, add flour, gradually add milk
Layer eggplant, meat mixture, and béchamel in baking dish
Top with breadcrumbs and bake at 350°F for 45 minutes
servingSuggestions: Serve with Greek salad and tzatziki sauce

instructions: Heat coconut milk in a wok until it starts to separate
Add curry paste and fry for 2 minutes
Add chicken and cook until no longer pink
Add vegetables and cook for 5 minutes
Season with fish sauce and palm sugar
Garnish with Thai basil and serve with jasmine rice
servingSuggestions: Serve with fresh lime wedges and extra fish sauce on the side

instructions: Melt butter and oil in a large pot
Add onions and sugar, cook slowly for 45 minutes until caramelized
Add flour and cook for 1 minute
Add wine and broth, bring to boil
Simmer for 30 minutes
Toast baguette slices
Ladle soup into bowls, top with bread and cheese
Broil until cheese is melted and bubbly
servingSuggestions: Serve with a crisp green salad and crusty bread
